meanings.definition: A long, loose-fitting coat or outer garment typically reaching to the ankles.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish maxicoat to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured models strutting in elegant maxicoats.
meanings.sent3: The maxicoat was so long, it almost tripped her on the runway!
meanings.sent4: Her maxicoat billowed behind her like a flowing river of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The deep blue color of the maxicoat stood out in the sea of black coats.

meanings.definition: To wear or use a maxicoat.
meanings.sent1: She loves to maxicoat during chilly evenings.
meanings.sent2: He decided to maxicoat for the outdoor concert.
meanings.sent3: I maxicoated yesterday, and it kept me cozy all day.
meanings.sent4: They will maxicoat for the first time at the party.
meanings.sent5: Maxicoating in the rain made her feel like a character from a movie.
